pages.text: The Raidens are descendants of an ancient lineage of samurai who have since evolved into masters of lightning and storm. With lightning coursing through their veins, they are seen as living storms, their swords crackling with electric energy.

They live by an ancient code of honor and discipline, sworn to protect Thalrathis from any who would bring chaos. Their villages are hidden among the mountain peaks where the storms rage the strongest, and it is said that their ancestors once forged their weapons by channeling the raw power of thunderstorms.

The Raidens are intrinsically linked to Fulgaris. Their connection to the storm is not just physical but spiritual, with each Raiden able to channel powerful bolts of lightning from the heavens. They are also adept in the ancient art of Vocaris, using their mastery of elemental forces to summon and control the energies of the world around them.
